title: How to Draw Haida Art

steps.headline: Draw a rectangle and a curved line.
Add two rectangles and two triangles.
Draw a long curved lines, two short straight lines and one semicircle.
Add few connecting lines and draw one more semicircle.
Add the rest of the necessary shapes.
Color the drawing.
steps.description: Use red and black crayons or other coloring tools.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers, or watercolors.
text: Draw a rectangle and a curved line.  Add two rectangles and two triangles.  Draw a long curved lines, two short straight lines and one semicircle.  Add few connecting lines and draw one more semicircle.  Draw some ornaments, as shown.  Add the rest of the necessary shapes.  Erase the guidelines.  Color the drawing. Use red and black crayons or other coloring tools. Finished.
sentences: Draw a rectangle and a curved line.
Add two rectangles and two triangles.
Draw a long curved lines, two short straight lines and one semicircle.
Add few connecting lines and draw one more semicircle.
Add the rest of the necessary shapes.
Use red and black crayons or other coloring tools.
